resources:
F4G
//Headings Donate Food On the Go Directly Connect To An NGO View Donor Details and confirm the Donor Feel Free to Connect Us
//Description Donor need not login and can directly fill out the form In case the donor wants to directly contact an NGO, he/she can clcik on the above button which will redirect him to the list of NGOs from which he can directly contact the nearest one. The NGO can log into the app and view the donor uploads and confirm the donor according o the requirement it has to fulfill. The users can also connect us without any hesitation and send their queries/problems to us or directly call on our help desk number given.
